title: How do I set the face unlock function?
answer:
1. Go to Settings and touch Privacy & security > Security > Screen security > Screen lock > Face Unlock. 

 1. Follow the onscreen instructions, touch Set it up then Continue. Wait for your phone to identify your face and touch Continue. 

 1. On the displayed Choose backup lock mode screen, touch another screen unlock method and set the method. When you are done, touch OK.
